comments.creator: mnyromyr@tprac.de
comments.raw_text: Bug 22112 introduced light purple as the signal colour for 'replied'. We should make the arrows of the toolbar buttons for 'Reply', 'Reply All' match. (The 'forwarded' colour by 22112 is blue, just like the 'Forward' toolbar button.)
